long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get ready to mix up your agent choices with the Valorant Agent Randomizer! This simple and fun Chrome extension has one job: to help you pick a random Valorant agent with a single click. No more debates or second-guessing your choice—just press the button and let fate decide. When clicked, the extension instantly displays a random agent’s image to inspire your next pick. Perfect for players looking for variety, spontaneity, or a fun way to practice different roles and playstyles. Download now and let the Valorant Agent Randomizer add some excitement to your game lineup!
